events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated in days, which is very frustrating.
The issue has been identified as related to a delivery delay based on the customer's description of the late shipment and tracking status.
The case has been assigned to a customer service representative specialized in shipping and delivery inquiries.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. Let's see how we can help resolve this for you quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can investigate the shipping status?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and the last tracking update was from the distribution center three days ago.
I've contacted the shipping company to prioritize your package. In the meantime, I will also refund your shipping fee as an apology for the delay.
Thank you for the quick response and the refund offer. I appreciate your help and hope the package arrives soon.
We've processed the refund and arranged for expedited delivery. You should receive your order within the next two days.
Just checking in to confirm that your order has arrived and that you're satisfied with the resolution provided. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for choosing our service and have a great day!
